description: This procurement is for the acquisition of three electric pontoons and trailers for Parks Canada. The pontoons must meet the Mandatory Requirements listed in Annex A of the ACAN, including a minimum of 10 HP electric motor, 6-person capacity, black color, and 24-volt battery with fast charger. The trailers must have a length of 19 feet for one trailer and 21 feet for two trailers. The deadline for submitting a statement of capabilities is January 15, 2024, at 2:00 P.M. EST.

## Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** E-Pontoon Boat Acquisition

**Procurement Reference:** PW-__MC-029-29255

**Published Date:** December 28, 2023

**Closing Date:** January 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Category:** Goods/Services (Publisher ID: N1940, Description: Small Craft)

**Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has an immediate requirement for a comprehensive solution to meet the operational needs of Parks Canada (PC) for three (3) small electric-powered pontoon boats, along with three (3) trailers. The current internal combustion engines (ICE) small vessels have reached their end of life and require replacement to align with the Federal Government's Greening Government Strategy.

**Background:**

PC operates three (3) small vessels, supporting operations in transporting personnel and equipment to Fort Lennox National Historic Site in Western Quebec and Thousand Islands National Park in Eastern Ontario. These vessels have reached their end of life and have been identified for replacement with electric-powered pontoon boats. The procurement aims to provide a comprehensive solution to meet the operational needs of PC.

**Requirements:**

The procurement requires suppliers to demonstrate:

*   Experience in supplying mature and proven pontoon designs, meeting the Mandatory Requirements listed in Annex A of this document.
*   Capability to offer maintenance services for e-Pontoons located in Quebec and Eastern Ontario.

### Eligibility
Suppliers who consider themselves qualified and available to provide goods and services described in the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this note before the closing date. This statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Closing Date:** January 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
